Package blot.engine.processing

Class Knob

java.lang.Object
blot.engine.input.blotLibrary.Point
blot.engine.processing.Knob
public class Knob extends Point
The things around an image in MS Paint that let you scale the image and stuff

  • Constructor Details

    • Knob

      public Knob(double x, double y, int type, CanvasObject canvasObject)
      Create a knob at the coordinates x, y (which are both -1 -> 1)
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate, -1 to 1
      y - The y coordinate, -1 to 1
      type - The type of knob. Should be a Knob.RIGHT_TOP, Knob.CENTER_BOTTOM, etc
      canvasObject - The parent canvasObject to scale and move and rotate

      Parameters:

      isShiftPressed - Whether the shift button is pressed
